get.summary: Returns a Workspace-Type including the corresponding Root-Folder-Type

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: Name of a Workspace-Type.

put.summary: Updates a Workspace-Type and the included Folder-Type with its attributes
put.description: **Picklist**: Please be aware that you only can add entries to a picklist, but you cannot remove them.If you omit entries there will be no error message. Instead the omitted entries are kept.

Update attributes (also delete picklist).description:
This example assumes that the workspace type is created with create example "minimum".
It modifies attributes "First Name" and "Last Name". Their display names, descriptions, sizes and required flags are changed.
The attribute "Gender" is omitted in order to delete it. You must also omit its picklist definition in "datatype_definitions".
A new attribute "Department" is added.
Warning: The ids of these attributes must be provided because it would delete the old ones and create new ones. This prevents adding new attributes if instances already exists.

attributes.description: First name of employee (also middle names)

Add entry to picklist.description:
This example assumes that the workspace type is created with create example "minimum".
It updates the picklist "gender_pl" with the entry "Diverse".
Note: Leave out the property "datatype_definition" of the attribute using the picklist.
The example is shortened. Normally you have to include the existing attributes and picklists as well. If not you would delete them.

New picklist.description:
This example assumes that the workspace type is created with create example "minimum".
It creates a new attribute "Job Level" based on the new picklist "job_level_pl".
The example is shortened. Normally you have to include the existing attributes and picklists as well. If not you would delete them.

Update attribute localizations (also dis.description:
This example assumes that the workspace type is created with create example "minimum".
It adds display names localized in German and French to both type itself and its attributes.

delete.description: Deletes a Workspace-Type including his corresponding Root-Folder-Type and Workspace Templates.

parameters.name: typeName
parameters.description: Name of a Workspace-Type.

WorkspaceTypeNotFound.description: If Workspace Type does not exist.

value.message: Cannot find Workspace Type with internal name employee

patch.summary: Update only parts of a Workspace-Type.
patch.description:
The properties **description**, **display_name**, **root_folder_type**, **roles** and **permission_templates** can be changed individually without having to specify one of the other properties in the PATCH-call.

**Picklist**: Please be aware that you only can add entries to a picklist, but you cannot remove them.If you omit entries there will be no error message. Instead the omitted entries are kept.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Include children of the root-folder the as well.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, changes will be applied to ALL children. If false, only children with same permissions will be affected. This switch only has an effect with recursive=true

patch.summary: Grant access and / or revoke access to a user / role / group etc.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: Include children of the root-folder the as well.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If true, changes will be applied to ALL children. If false, only children with same permissions will be affected. This switch only has an effect with recursive=true

patch.summary: Updates the Workspace Template of the given Workspace Type
patch.description:
You can update the following sections independently. Within the sections you have to provide everything.
1. display_name
2. case_model.display_name
3. case_model.root_case_node

Update folder structure.description: Updates the folder structure. You have to send the whole case_model part without its id, name or namespace. You can left the case_model's display_name.

case_model.description: Case Model of Workspace Template Employee North America

Add German display name.description: Adds the German display name (complete localization must be send)

Remove German display name.description: Remove the German display name (complete localization must be send)

case_model.description: Case Model of Workspace Template Employee North America

DefaultDisplayNameEmpty.description: if the default display name ( locale English) is set to an empty value

value.message: The default display name must not be empty.

WorkspaceTemplateNotFound.description: If Workspace Template does not exist.

value.message: Cannot find Workspace Template with name employeeNA within Workspace Type employee.

WorkspaceTypeNotFound.description: If Workspace Type does not exist.

value.message: Cannot find Workspace Type with internal name employee

get.summary: Get all Workspaces of a certain Workspace-Type

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description:
You can filter the result by any attribute of the root folder. For details about filter syntax please see CMS documentation.

Examples:
`gender eq 'Female'`
`display_name like '%Neil%'`
`(gender eq 'Female') or (display_name like '%Neil%')`

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description:
You can sort the result by any attribute of the root folder. For details about sorting syntax please see CMS documentation.

Examples:
`sortby=name`
`sortby=name desc`

parameters.name: include-types
